Class LogManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • plugins.mbes.managers.LogManager

  • public class LogManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to make logs and to log to them.

      • closeAll

        public void closeAll()
              throws java.io.IOException
        This method should not be used as it will close all loggers!
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getDate

        public static java.lang.String getDate()
        Returns:
        The date in this format - Hour:minute:second

      • getExactDate

        public static java.lang.String getExactDate()
        Returns:
        The date in this format - Day_Month_year_Hour_minute_second

      • writeLog

        public boolean writeLog(java.lang.String write,
               int ID)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Writes a string to a log When you log something the log will make a new line The date is also logged when you log something
        Parameters:
        write - - String to write
        ID - - the ID of the logger you can use Logger.getId() to get the loggers id.
        Returns:
        true if the logging was successful false if a logger with that id was not found
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - an IO error occurs

      • writeLog

        public boolean writeLog(java.lang.String write,
               Logger log)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Writes a string to a log When you log something the log will make a new line the date is also logged when you log something
        Parameters:
        write - - The string to write to the log
        log - - the logger to use
        Returns:
        true if the logging was successful false if the logger was not found
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - - if a IO error occurs
